comm

Class PCD_Interface

  • java.lang.Object
    • comm.PCD_Interface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_HWI_Listener, I_PCDI

    public class PCD_Interface
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_PCDI, I_HWI_Listener
    PCD_Interface

    this is the class implements the interface of the PCDI and the Hardware Listener. It is responsible for handling the requests from the upper layer and for converting bytes from the hardware layer and notifying the upper layer

      • startOscilloscope

        public void startOscilloscope(PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_COMMAND osci_cmd,
                              int valNr1,
                              int valNr2,
                              int valNr3,
                              int valNr4,
                              int valNr5,
                              int valNr6,
                              int valNr7,
                              int oversampling,
                              int deviceId)
        Description copied from interface: I_PCDI
        this method initiates a start of the oscilloscope-recording
        Specified by:
        startOscilloscope in interface I_PCDI
        Parameters:
        osci_cmd - wether to only start the osci or additionally enable a controller
        valNr1 - the value number of the desired recording parameter1
        valNr2 - the value number of the desired recording parameter2
        valNr3 - the value number of the desired recording parameter3
        valNr4 - the value number of the desired recording parameter4
        valNr5 - the value number of the desired recording parameter5
        valNr6 - the value number of the desired recording parameter6
        valNr7 - the value number of the desired recording parameter7
        oversampling - factor to not use every timestep to sample
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
